name: vitepress-i18n
description: VitePress i18n is a plugin for VitePress that makes it easy to translate text in the default theme and search tool.
author: jooy2 <jooy2.contact@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run format:fix && tsc --project tsconfig.prod.json && npm run minify
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha test/specs/**/*.spec.ts -r ts-node/register --loader=ts-node/esm --timeout 10000
scripts.minify: terser dist/index.js --config-file .terserrc -o dist/index.js && terser dist/strings.js --config-file .terserrc -o dist/strings.js
scripts.docs:dev: npm run build && vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: npm run build && vitepress build docs
scripts.docs:serve: npm run build && npm run docs:build && vitepress serve docs
